item.title: AD – Jason Allen’s Rules of Order? [AD on FLF Network]
item.description:
Jason Allen wrote an article that identified some problems when dealing with anonymous accusations/anonymous trolls. So far so good. But then he tries to set some “rules” of engagement for Christians, especially Southern Baptists.Â  Uh no thank you. I already know how to fight….and now you’ve given us a window into your thought process. It’s clear that the reality that we have become a threat to the agenda of the “Big Eva” machine is well known and causing much anxiety. Good!

Here’s the article –

Denominational Discourse & the Future of the SBC

item.title: AD – Anthony Bradley Owns Himself [AD on FLF Network]
item.description:
Someone shared this amazing article by Dr. Anthony Bradley. – https://acton.org/pub/commentary/2008/04/02/marxist-roots-black-liberation-theology?fbclid=IwAR07JJ-WqQc2YJvhju0rNlOExHkWjKHPVXGq2Sk97bk0jYHInmEUoJjk_M8

But

IF: “Black liberation theology, originally intended to help the black community, may have actually hurt many blacks by promoting racial tension, victimology, and Marxism, which ultimately leads to more oppression.”

THEN: why does Dr Bradley’s own twitter feed consistently promote racial tension through inflammatory racial statements. And why does he claim bogus victimhood all. the. time?

These are two things that he seems to KNOW leads to more oppression.

I am perplexed….but then again…I’m just a pleb.

Here is a video I made on the topic:

item.description: I’ve had it. I’ve completely had it. There is no moral equivalency between the Democrats and the Republicans. I’ve had it.Â  Â  And before you say it….No im not a Republican….but that doesnt mean I see a clear difference in voting for a Republican who isnt consistent with your values and a Democrat. There is a clear difference.

item.title: AD Robles: Exactly How Stupid Do You Think I Am? – FLF Network Episode 2 [AD on FLF Network]
item.description:
Finally! We will all find out how stupid I may or may not be.

Social Justice advocates promote a lot of things that *sound* really good on the surface… but it’s a scam. It’s flim flam. It’s a bamboozle. It’s a hustle….and I smell a rat.Â  Take it from me, I’m from Brooklyn.

Please reach out to me on twitter @RedeemedRutland OR hit me up on YouTubeÂ youtube.com/c/ADRobles

item.title: White Supremacists Found Within The Gospel Coalition! – AD on FLF Network Episode 1 [AD on FLF Network]
item.description:
Sorry to bring this important news to you but there are literal white supremacists among us. Let this be a call to action.

I look forward to getting to know you all better this year on the Fight Laugh Feast Network. Please reach out to me on twitter @RedeemedRutland OR hit me up on YouTubeÂ youtube.com/c/ADRobles
